alert.note: Alert for DuPage; Eastern Will; Grundy; Northern Will; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 2:33PM CST until February 16 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation, including a likely period of freezing rain or freezing drizzle, becoming all snow this evening. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with highest north and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph, leading to blowing snow in exposed locations. * WHERE...DuPage, Grundy, Northern Will, Southern Will and Eastern Will Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the afternoon commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: DuPage; Eastern Will; Grundy; Northern Will; Southern Will
